name: Synergetix
overview: Synergetix Limited engages in developing and marketing business intelligence products. The company’s products include WallFlower, a digital signage system to deliver signage and advertising solutions; and SOAR, a small airline online reservation and management system for small to medium size operators to access their airline information from through the Internet, which allows them to leave day to day operations to staff whilst keeping a watching brief or managing remotely. It also offers STRIPES, a customer relationship management (CRM) and loyalty product to develop target marketing programs and use CRM techniques for customer retention and market penetration; and STARS, a retail analytic product providing an approach to slicing and dicing data and developing analytics. In addition, the company’s products include findalodge.com, an international travel and reservation Web portal, which provides a public booking service for members of the FindaLodge network; and TRACCA, a property management system for smaller accommodation providers, and the travel and tourism industry. Further, it provides a range of consulting services associated with data warehousing and decision support applications specializing in the retail and tourism sectors; and Website design services to develop sites for various accommodation providers. Synergetix Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.
